sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INSR5100 (DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY, EMYMT_SEIL_NUM) SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM FROM PSNL0110 AA WHERE AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM = (SELECT MAX (BB.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM) FROM PSNL0110 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND EMYMT_TYP_CD = 'A0420010') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INSR5100 NN WHERE NN.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND NN.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND NN.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM = AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM)

INSERT INTO INSR5100 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , SOC_INSR_DDUC_ETHD_CD , UMYT_INSR_AQTN_DT , UMYT_INSR_LSS_DT , UMYT_INSR_EEPN_YN , UMYT_INSR_EEPN_REAS_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #emymtSeilNum# , #socInsrDducEthdCd# , #umytInsrAqtnDt# , #umytInsrLssDt# , #umytInsrEepnYn# , #umytInsrEepnReasCtnt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INSR5100 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# , SOC_INSR_DDUC_ETHD_CD=#socInsrDducEthdCd# , UMYT_INSR_AQTN_DT=#umytInsrAqtnDt# , UMYT_INSR_LSS_DT=#umytInsrLssDt# , UMYT_INSR_EEPN_YN=#umytInsrEepnYn# , UMYT_INSR_EEPN_REAS_CTNT=#umytInsrEepnReasCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM INSR5100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , SOC_INSR_DDUC_ETHD_CD , UMYT_INSR_AQTN_DT , UMYT_INSR_LSS_DT , UMYT_INSR_EEPN_YN , UMYT_INSR_EEPN_REAS_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR5100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , SOC_INSR_DDUC_ETHD_CD , UMYT_INSR_AQTN_DT , UMYT_INSR_LSS_DT , UMYT_INSR_EEPN_YN , UMYT_INSR_EEPN_REAS_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR5100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM INSR5100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
